languages.text: "Все так, Вольный Торговец. То, что вы наблюдаете на Летусе — это вынужденные меры".
"She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."
languages.original_text: "Все так, Вольный Торговец. То, что вы наблюдаете на Летусе — это вынужденные меры".

traits.locale_text: "You are not wrong, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are drastic measures."
"You are not wrong, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are drastic measures."
"You are not wrong, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are drastic measures."
"You are not wrong, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are drastic measures."
"She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."
"She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."

languages.text: «Tiene razón, Comerciante. Lo que ve en Leethus son medidas de emergencia».
languages.original_text: "She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, Comerciante. Lo que ve en Leethus son medidas de emergencia».

languages.text: “她说得没错，行商浪人。利瑟斯如今发生的一切都只是权宜之计。”
languages.original_text: "She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."

traits.locale_text: “她说得没错，行商浪人。利瑟斯如今发生的一切都只是权宜之计。”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、彼女が言っていることは正しいです。リーザスで目にする物事は、やむを得ないことなのです」
languages.original_text: "She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、彼女が言っていることは正しいです。リーザスで目にする物事は、やむを得ないことなのです」

languages.text: « Elle a raison, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La situation actuelle sur Leethus est la conséquence de mesures prises par nécessité. »
languages.original_text: "She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."

traits.locale_text: « Elle a raison, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La situation actuelle sur Leethus est la conséquence de mesures prises par nécessité. »

languages.text: "Dediklerinde haklı Hür Tacir. Leethus'ta gördükleriniz, mecburiyetten alınmış tedbirlerdir."
languages.original_text: "She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."

traits.locale_text: "Dediklerinde haklı Hür Tacir. Leethus'ta gördükleriniz, mecburiyetten alınmış tedbirlerdir."

languages.text: "Sie hat recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Die Maßnahmen auf Leethus sind unvermeidbar."
languages.original_text: "She is right, Rogue Trader. What you are witnessing on Leethus are forced measures."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hat recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Die Maßnahmen auf Leethus sind unvermeidbar."
